name: Let's Play: Ancient Greek Punishment: Bitsy Demake
name_original: Let's Play: Ancient Greek Punishment: Bitsy Demake
description: Let's Play: Ancient Greek Punishment: Bitsy Demake is yet another new edition in the Let's Play: Ancient Greek Punishment series, each focusing on a retelling of five (kind of) mythological punishments. In Bitsy Demake the game is retold in the form of a Bitsy game.
